title: february 15: stamps on stamps
description:
Today on the pod, Maia talks about the beginning of the postage stamp and how stamps have evolved with the growth of the U.S. Postal Service. Then she talks about a musician’s pivot to writing which became a pivot to television. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
